articles.description: Chopra believes that due to similarities between both the white-ball forms of cricket, split captaincy would work better if one player leads both ODI and T20I teams, while Kohli leads the Test team. | Cricket
articles.content: Former India cricketer Aakash Chopra believes that the idea to use Virat Kohli as ODI and Test captain, and Rohit Sharma as T20I captain may not work. Kohli, on Thursday (September 16), announced tha… [+2038 chars]
